item.title: Best way to smuggle small amounts of drugs?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

N00b1:

video tapes sound good, if i were you id not get your prints on anything, put the product into a balloon and tie it off then put that balloon in another with a clove of chopped up garlic and tie that up then put it inside of the tape its self then main it off. but be sure not to put it in your local mail box xD id jump around a bit…

Sniffer dogs can smell weed or any other drugs Very easily… Even if its in a Bag underwater. My ex teacher used to have 2 dogs… 1 was a search and rescue dog for earthquakes and the other was a sniffer dog trained to find Drugs and guns

Read full topic

item.source: Best way to smuggle small amounts of drugs?

item.title: Best way to smuggle small amounts of drugs?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Airtight container, sterilize the outside. Vacuum seal the container, sterilize the outside again. It’s international so I would seal it twice actually. Make sure to sterilize each layer.

Dogs can be trained to smell anything even in incredibly low doses (micrograms…).

Read full topic

item.source: Best way to smuggle small amounts of drugs?

item.title: Best way to smuggle small amounts of drugs?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

On another topic

As I said I’m not going to say much. But the substances will be sent, and money will be gotten. I’ve heard of people wrapping stuff up in a lot of foil. Then putting it in a video tape and sending it through the post. But by doing this could you still get caught?

I don’t think Postal services care much about the shit you are sending, unless it’s a big package or to a big company. I mean, who’s going to send Anthrax to a civilian? But if they do find out what you are sending, they can find you. If it’s to a European country (I assume you are the one sending it, from the Netherlands) and it’s a nice amount they’ll find you. They’ll contact the local police, who will contact the police of the country you are sending it to. If the receiver is like you, all they have to do is put a little pressure on him and your dead.

Well not dead but yea.

Read full topic
